name: postcss-import-part
description: PostCSS plugin to import external file content at any place (like partial import)

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:main
scripts.lint: npm run lint:scripts-project && npm run lint:scripts-other
scripts.prepare: npm run clean && npm run build
